TopicTitle: How To Install Mods - Video Tutorial

Articles.Content:
A short tutorial showing how to install Mods for Kerbal Space Program. Short, sweet, and to the point. Was made during update .25.

Please SUBSCRIBE so you don't miss out on more spotlights, reviews, and Let's Plays: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_...er=spectorkidd
hmm this will be great for beginners in need of guidance for mod installation
Glad you think so. That's who I had in mind while making it.

Alternatively, there's a tool that's been written that idiot-proofs this entire process (as I know I've screwed it up on more than one occasion), being KSP-CKAN.

You might want to check it out at https://github.com/KSP-CKAN/CKAN/wiki/User-guide
